data.message: How do I get rid of that annoying message about the notifications ??  Really hate all the pop up stuff.

replies.message: Hi Barbara. To choose what you get notifications about, follow these steps in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2vMeac2. Thanks! -Stephanie
